attributes.action: decrease the age limit for voting to sixteen (16).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years the youth of Britain, the people who are most "in-tune" with modern affairs, have been forbidden from selecting the government which has a huge impact on their daily life. Therefore the age of suffrage (voting) must be reduced to 16 to allow every adult - young or old - their democratic rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
